p.seg: The Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences invites a man renowned for talent and erudition, the free Baron and most noble Lord Ferdinand von Mueller, into [its] community of studies, elected as a foreign member by a solemn vote [made known] by these letters patent, through which its recognition is attested.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;
p.seg: Cl. Adelsköld, President at the time.
